description: Define the layouts and tiles used in the Pyramid Puzzles.

puzzle.description: The name of this version of the Pyramid Puzzle.

numberOfTilesPerFace.description: The number of tiles used on each face of the puzzle.

totalNumberOfTiles.description: The total number of tiles used on the puzzle.

name.description: The name of a face on the tetrahedron.

joins.description: How a face joins with other faces on the tetrahedron.

tiles.description: The tiles used by the version of the puzzle.

tile.description: A number to identify the individual tile.

side1.description: A string representing the pattern on side one of the tile (Seg1, Seg2, Seg3, Seg4)

side2.description: A string representing the pattern on side two of the tile (Seg5, Seg6, Seg7, Seg8).

side3.description: A string representing the pattern on side three of the tile (Seg9, Seg10, Seg11, Seg12).
